name: Crustle

passive.name: Strudy
passive.effect: If Crustle has no damage counters on it, reduce any damage it takes above 40 to 40, and it cannot be Knocked Out.

attacks.name: Rest
attacks.effect: Remove 6 damage counters from Crustle. Next turn, Crustle is paralyzed.

attacks.name: Rock Toss
attacks.effect: Place one damage counter on a Benched Pokemon.

flavor: These massive crustaceans are huge problems for farmers. Seeing a crop walk away after months of work is too much for some to take.
